special_text:
[i](At the beginning of your upkeep, if you weren’t dealt combat damage since your last turn, put a brick counter on this outpost.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed.
 2+ Bricks
Whenever a Zombie you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life.
 3+ Bricks
The first time a Zombie you control dies each turn, draw a card.
